column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We rolled in late on a Sunday (before President's Day) with about 20 minutes left until the kitchen closed. We were starving and trying hard to find a place we could quick eat before they closed. Trying to be good patrons (and attempting for servers not to hate us for coming in so late)
column2: we ordered as soon as we sat down: Burrata (#23)
